entry.dcterms:title: Networks of the 1956 Revolution Convicts. Relationships.
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F09a: Networks of the 1956 Revolution Convicts. Relationships.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Kőrösi, Zsuzsanna
entry.dcterms:description: the research attemps to map out whether and to what extent the individual and complete system of relations can be reconstructed based on the memories of 1956 convicts from Budapest; revolution of 1956, retaliation, network analysis
entry.dcterms:subject: community, urban and rural life
person
semi-structured interview
time-series

The basic population is the convicts of the 1956 revolution. The sample consists of 106 biographical interviews the subjects of which took part in the 1956 revolution in Budapest, and were subsequently imprisoned for their activities.
Secondary analysis of unstructured interviews.
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
